Pre-Game Insights: Experts favor Cleveland Cavaliers to win based on their undefeated season and strong performance.
Philadelphia 76ers are struggling with a 2-8 record and are in danger of being last in the Eastern Conference.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Andre Drummond is expected to start in place of Joel Embiid, who is sitting out to avoid playing back-to-back games.
Others: Donovan Mitchell is leading Cleveland Cavaliers with 23.7 points per game, while their backcourt with Mitchell and Garland is considered one of the best in the league.
